headline: The Bull Case For QUALCOMM (QCOM) Could Change Following New Shareholder Meeting Rights And Governance Shift
summary: On December 9, 2025, Qualcomm’s board approved amended and restated bylaws that, among other changes, allow shareholders with at least 25% net long ownership to call special meetings and clarify the Executive Committee’s powers while expanding the company’s ability to purchase indemnification insurance under Delaware law. This governance update, alongside Qualcomm’s recent revenue growth from automotive and IoT diversification, highlights how the company is pairing operational progress with...
